mapper.select: select customer_id,customer_name,customer_type,customer_idcard, customer_idcard_type,customer_phone from customer where customer_idcard = #{customerIdCard};

select customer_id,customer_name,customer_type,customer_idcard, customer_idcard_type,customer_phone from customer
1 = 1
and customer_id = LIKE CONCAT('%', #{findCustomer.customerId}, '%')
and customer_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{findCustomer.customerName}, '%')
and customer_type = #{findCustomer.customerType}
and customer_phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{findCustomer.customerPhone}, '%')

SELECT c.customer_id AS customerId, c.customer_name AS customerName, c.customer_type AS customerType, c.customer_idcard AS customerIdcard, c.customer_idcard_type AS customerIdcardType, c.customer_phone AS customerPhone, a.account_risk_level AS riskLevel FROM customer c INNER JOIN account a ON c.customer_id = a.customer_id WHERE a.account_id = #{accountId}
